knowledge_base: A chatbot is a software application used to conduct an online chat conversation via text or text-to-speech.
Chatbots are often used in customer service to provide quick responses to frequently asked questions.
Some chatbots use artificial intelligence to provide a more interactive and human-like experience.
There are many types of chatbots, including rule-based and AI-based chatbots.

responses: I am glad! You are talking to me

fallback_response: I am sorry! I don't understand you.
